bill.summary: 7/24/2007--Passed Senate without amendment. Expresses the Senate's profound sympathy to the family of Dame Lois Browne Evans and the citizens of Bermuda on the passing of Dame Lois Browne Evans. Commends the lifetime achievements of Dame Lois Browne Evans, her commitment to public service, and the pioneering role she played for women and minorities.
